text.p: Click on a column header to sort the table.

ROW.title: Image Width
ROW.tagdesc: TIFF tag 256, 0x100. Image width in pixels.

ROW.title: Image Length
ROW.tagdesc: TIFF tag 257, 0x101. Image height in pixels.

ROW.title: Bits Per Sample
ROW.tagdesc: TIFF tag 258, 0x102. Number of bits per component in each channel.

ROW.title: Compression
ROW.tagdesc: TIFF tag 259, 0x103. Compression scheme: 1 = uncompressed; 6 = JPEG.

ROW.title: Photometric Interpretation
ROW.tagdesc: TIFF tag 262, 0x106. Pixel Composition: 2 = RGB; 6 = YCbCr.

ROW.title: Orientation
ROW.tagdesc: TIFF tag 274, 0x112. Orientation:1 = 0th row at top, 0th column at left 2 = 0th row at top, 0th column at right 3 = 0th row at bottom, 0th column at right 4 = 0th row at bottom, 0th column at left 5 = 0th row at left, 0th column at top 6 = 0th row at right, 0th column at top 7 = 0th row at right, 0th column at bottom 8 = 0th row at left, 0th column at bottom

ROW.title: Samples Per Pixel
ROW.tagdesc: TIFF tag 277, 0x115. Number of components per pixel.

ROW.title: Planar Configuration
ROW.tagdesc: TIFF tag 284, 0x11C. Data layout:1 = chunky; 2 = planar.

ROW.title: YCbCr Sub Sampling
ROW.tagdesc: TIFF tag 530, 0x212. Sampling ratio of chrominance components: [2, 1] = YCbCr4:2:2; [2, 2] = YCbCr4:2:0

ROW.title: YCbCr Positioning
ROW.tagdesc: TIFF tag 531, 0x213. Position of chrominance vs. luminance components: 1 = centered; 2 = co-sited.

ROW.title: X Resolution
ROW.tagdesc: TIFF tag 282, 0x11A. Horizontal resolution in pixels per unit.

ROW.title: Y Resolution
ROW.tagdesc: TIFF tag 283, 0x11B. Vertical resolution in pixels per unit.

ROW.title: Resolution Unit
ROW.tagdesc: TIFF tag 296, 0x128. Unit used for XResolution and YResolution. Value is one of: 2 = inches; 3 = centimeters.

ROW.title: Transfer Function
ROW.tagdesc: TIFF tag 301, 0x12D. Transfer function for image described in tabular style with 3 * 256 entries.

ROW.title: White Point
ROW.tagdesc: TIFF tag 318, 0x13E. Chromaticity of white point.

ROW.title: Primary Chromaticities
ROW.tagdesc: TIFF tag 319, 0x13F. Chromaticity of the three primary colors.

ROW.title: YCbCr Coefficients
ROW.tagdesc: TIFF tag 529, 0x211. Matrix coefficients for RGB to YCbCr transformation.

ROW.title: Reference Black White
ROW.tagdesc: TIFF tag 532, 0x214. Reference black and white point values.

ROW.title: Date and Time
ROW.tagdesc: TIFF tag 306, 0x132 (primary) and EXIF tag 37520, 0x9290 (subseconds). Date and time of image creation (no time zone in EXIF), stored in ISO 8601 format, not the original EXIF format. This property includes the value for the EXIF SubSecTime attribute. NOTE: This property is stored in XMP as xmp:ModifyDate.

ROW.title: Image Description
ROW.tagdesc: TIFF tag 270, 0x10E. Description of the image. Note: This property is stored in XMP as dc:description.

ROW.title: Make
ROW.tagdesc: TIFF tag 271, 0x10F. Manufacturer of recording equipment.

ROW.title: Model
ROW.tagdesc: TIFF tag 272, 0x110. Model name or number of equipment.

ROW.title: Software
ROW.tagdesc: TIFF tag 305, 0x131. Software or firmware used to generate image. Note: This property is stored in XMP as xmp:CreatorTool.

ROW.title: Artist
ROW.tagdesc: TIFF tag 315, 0x13B. Camera owner, photographer or image creator. Note: This property is stored in XMP as the first item in the dc:creator array.

ROW.title: Copyright
ROW.tagdesc: TIFF tag 33432, 0x8298. Copyright information. Note: This property is stored in XMP as dc:rights.
